html:
Happy New Year! Did you walk away from Christmas with more games to play and a backlog that seems impossible to chop through? Well, get ready to possibly add even more games to it, as Amazon has announced 16 free games are coming to Prime members in January.

Suggested Reading

The Week In Games: A Star Wars Classic Returns & More New Releases

  • Off
  • English

Suggested Reading

If you hop over to Amazon Prime Gaming and are currently subscribed to Amazon Prime, you can snag Bioshock 2 Remastered, Spirit Mancer, and a few other games right away. Then, throughout the rest of the month, you’ll be able to grab around a dozen more games, including Super Meat Boy Forever, Deus Ex, Zombie Army 4, and Blood West.

Here’s the full list of games, as well as when they will be available for free on Amazon Prime and which storefronts they use. Oh, and keep in mind these are all PC games, sorry console-only players.

Available today!

  • Eastern Exorcist - Epic Games Store
  • The Bridge - Epic Games Store
  • BioShock 2 Remastered - via GOG
  • SpiritMancer - Amazon Games App
  • SkyDrift Infinity - Epic Games Store

16th January:

  • GRIP - via GOG
  • Steam World Quest: Hand of Gilgamech - via GOG
  • Are You Smarter Than A 5th Grader - Epic Games Store

23rd January:

  • Deus Ex: Game of the Year Edition - via GOG
  • To The Rescue! - Epic Games Store
  • Star Stuff - Epic Games Store
  • Spitlings - Amazon Games App
  • Zombie Army 4: Dead War - Epic Games Store

30th January:

  • Ender Lilies: Quietus of the Knights - Epic Games Store
  • Blood West - via GOG
  • Super Meat Boy Forever - Epic Games Store

Also be aware that some games added in previous months are still floating around on Amazon Prime Gaming’s site. For example, you can still nab The Gunk, Monster Train, and Shogun Showdown. So if you haven’t grabbed those other freebies and you’re a Prime subscriber, you should check out everything on the site and see if there are some hidden gems still waiting to be played.
